sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

Consider the given figure. It is given that \(OP \parallel LN \), and \(OQ \parallel LP \). Now, prove that
\[
	\frac{MQ }{QP } = \frac{MP }{PN }
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 
$$\text{In the triangle LMN , we have $OP \parallel LN $. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{}}{OL } = \frac{MP }{PN }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, in triangle LMP , we have $OQ \parallel LP $. So, again we can write
\[
	\frac{MO }{\input[s2v1]{}\input[s2v2]{} } = \frac{MQ }{QP }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
So, by combining above two equations, we get
\[
	\frac{MQ }{\input[s3v1]{}\input[s3v2]{} } = \frac{MP }{PN }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["M", "O"], "text": "$$\text{In the triangle LMN , we have $OP \parallel LN $, so from the basic proportionality theorem, we can write $\frac{MO }{OL } = \frac{MP }{PN }$}$$"}, {"data": ["O", "L"], "text": "$$\text{In the triangle LMP , we have $OQ \parallel LP $, therefore, again using Thale's Theorem, we get $\frac{MO }{OL } = \frac{MQ }{QP }$}$$"}, {"data": ["Q", "P"], "text": "$$\text{Using property, if $a = b$, and $a = c$, then $b = c$, therefore, from the above results we can write $\frac{MQ }{QP } = \frac{MP }{PN }$}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
